title: Flip book [interactive]
brief_description:
An interactive allowing visitors to make their own flip books that can be saved to their Lens. Visitors can also purchase printed versions of their flip books in the ACMI Shop.

Visitors stand in front of flipbook maker and select ‘record’, they are then advised to ‘get ready’.

When recording, a count down timer will advise of how long visitors have left.

Visitors can then save their flipbook to their lens and then proceed to the ACMI shop for printing.

This interactive was re-booted from ACMI’s previous exhibition “Screen Worlds” because it was a crowd favourite. The design of the interactive and flipbook has been updated.
